name: Rufus
text: I think I'd like the friendzone, I like friends!

name: Bill the Sentient Sword
text: It's not as pleasent as you'd think

name: Bill the Sentient Sword
text: They don't treat you like a friend, they treat you...

name: Bill the Sentient Sword
text: I wish I could be more to these women, but as a gamer I don't get respect

name: Rufus
text: Well, I'm not a gamer, maybe they'll respect me?

name: Bill the Sentient Sword
text: That just makes you a beta cuck
